name: Reclaiming the Charred Vale
tooltip:
Reclaiming the Charred Vale

Keeper Albagorm on Stonetalon Peak wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.

Requirements:
- Bloodfury Harpy x 7
- Bloodfury Ambusher x 7
- Bloodfury Slayer x 7
- Bloodfury Roguefeather x 7
